Francium (Fr)

Description

Discovered by Marguerite Perey in 1939, Francium is the most reactive element amongst the alkali metals, however there is no official proof of how reactive it could be. It has also no known uses.

Atomic Diagram

Atomic Number

87

Atomic Mass

223

Melting point

21℃

Boiling Point

650℃

Group

1

Period

7
